channel.title: [PI] - Object giving exp. *SOLVED*

item.title: [PI] - Object giving exp. *SOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Hey guys, I was wondering how to make it to where when you click a OBJECT (Agility OBJECT) it gives you agility exp?

For anyone who google searched this and might be looking for this too;
Actionhandler:

c.getPA().addSkillXP(125*c.playerLevel[16], c.playerAgility); c.getPA().refreshSkill(c.playerAgility);

Read full topic
